name: Invasion
short: Fight off random alien encounters for currency
description: Aliens are invading and they want your currency! When they land, who will be brave enough to fight them off?
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg: The aliens have finally shown themselves! Setup where your frontlines will be and how much you plan to reward your soldiers for taking on these hideous creatures from outer space!
author: chovin (irdumb)
